description: This file sets up a knowledge base with a PDF document, configures an AI agent with OpenAI's GPT-4 model, and performs sample queries to demonstrate the agent's capabilities in retrieving information from the knowledge base.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An AI agent that interacts with a knowledge base and performs responses based on user queries.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A knowledge base that loads and manages PDF documents for information retrieval.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A model interface for OpenAI's GPT-based chat models.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A vector database interface for PostgreSQL using pgvector extension.

classes.name: SearchType
classes.description: Enumeration for different search types, e.g., hybrid search.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads or reloads the knowledge base, optionally recreating the index.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a given prompt, optionally streaming the response.
